name: Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder
description:
In Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder you need to defend yourself from enemy waves by shooting missiles from your tank.

To shot so you need to charge the power the missile. The longer you charge the stronger will be blast - but enemy will have more time to go through your defenses! The goal is to let as few soldiers pass through your lines of defense as possible.

Sounds easy? We dare you to try to complete this game!

And don’t be deceived by simple rules - amount of enemy types, bonuses, goals, stage conditions and missile types is more than enough to keep you entertained for hours!

Game offers:

- three completely different campaigns
- numerous enemy types - from soldiers and trained dogs to transporters and cyber bikes!
- three different shooting modes
- several killing conditions
- 3 difficulty levels
- more than 25 power-ups
- 52 unique accomplishments to collect
- 84 challenging levels
- 252 medals to earn
